posts.message:
#AngularJS Video & Sample Code: Using Recursive Templates & ng-include To Create A Tree Hierarchy

(A quick 12 minutes video and very few lines of code)
posts.caption: gurustop.net
posts.description: Hello again and welcome to another Angular.JS video. This time I talk briefly about templates in Angular.JS and the ng-include directives, and how to combine them to create recursive templates that can be used to model any number of tree levels.
